name: Laika
description: Greek popular music played with local instruments like the bouzouki, Greek baglama, and the jouras.

children.name: Entechna laika
children.description: Artistic side of Laika played mainly but not always with the basic instruments of it, the bouzouki, Greek baglama, and the jouras, sometimes with the accompaniment of orchestras.

children.name: Entechna laika
children.description: Artistic side of Laika played mainly but not always with the basic instruments of it, the bouzouki, Greek baglama, and the jouras, sometimes with the accompaniment of orchestras.

children.name: Modern Laika
children.description: Laiki music mixed with popular Western music, most notably pop and dance.

children.name: Modern Laika
children.description: Laiki music mixed with popular Western music, most notably pop and dance.

children.name: Skiladika
children.description: Greek popular artists who used more Arabian elements; originally a derogatory term used to refer to a more decadent side of Laika.

children.name: Skiladika
children.description: Greek popular artists who used more Arabian elements; originally a derogatory term used to refer to a more decadent side of Laika.
